 Ok lower file says;=C2=A0 "Dave, Pokey, Nick, roll that wiring up, she's l=
ooking at me, Michael," and the other one says, "that's right dear, Ok, giv=
e me that, that's so nice, Yeah, stay on line, hey" sf

Subject: [RTSC] Sometimes they just drop dead. [2 Attachments]

          =
=C2=A0                                            [Attachment(s) from Frank=
 Sumption included below]                       
=C2=A0A dying tuner in box=
 86, then I disconnected the original tuner and clip leaded in an Arm Band =
hack=C2=A0radio to check the rest of the audio chain. So after that I took =
out the original tuner, the one that had the shortwave wave band, then I'll=
 have to remake the front panel too.=C2=A0 These things are often a crap sh=
oot.
  =C2=A0
 =C2=A0F-S

<div>&nb=
sp;A dying tuner in box 86, then I disconnected the original tuner and clip=
 leaded in an Arm Band hack radio to check the rest of the audio chain=
. So after that I took out the original tuner, the one that had the shortwa=
ve wave band, then I'll have to remake the front panel too.  These thi=
ngs are often a crap shoot.</div>
  
<div> </div>
